#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    char ch;
    cin.get(ch); //To escape the newline character
    while ( t-- )
    {
        string s;
        int i;
        getline(cin,s);
        int l=s.length();
        //cout<<l<<endl;
        if(l==1)
            cout<<(round(pow((s[0]-'a'),2)))<<endl;
        else
        {
            cout<<(round(pow((s[0]-'a'),2)));
            for(i=1;i<l;i++)
            {
                if(s[i]==' ')
                    cout<<'$';
                else
                {
                    if(s[i-1]!=' ')
                        cout<<'-';
                    cout<<(round(pow((s[i]-'a'),2)));
                }
 
            }
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
